Compile from Source

1 Download
http://sphinxsearch.com/downloads/sphinx-2.2.10-release.tar.gz

2 Extract

cd to extracted directory

./configure 
make
sudo make install



gem 'thinking-sphinx', '~> 3.1.4'
gem 'mysql2', :require => 'thinking_sphinx'

bundle


mysql2 required, otherwise you get the error:

rails d/Users/zepho/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.0@rails5/gems/thinking-sphinx-3.1.4/lib/thinking_sphinx.rb:6:in `require': cannot load such file -- mysql2 (LoadError)

rails g scaffold article title content:text


database.yml

development:
  adapter: mysql2
  encoding: utf8
  reconnect: false
  database: tnx_development
  pool: 5
  username: root
  password:
  host: localhost
  port: 3306

Start MySQL on Mac :

sudo /usr/local/mysql/support-files/mysql.server start

ERROR! The server quit without updating PID file

Create an empty file /usr/local/mysql/data/zepho-mac-pro.local.pid


rails db:migrate
